abstract: General Electric announced that it will invest in a $5 million round for SynapSense, a start-up that makes wireless sensor technology and software to monitor and reduce power usage and cooling in data centers, GigaOm reported.
snippet: General Electric announced that it will invest in a $5 million round for SynapSense, a start-up that makes wireless sensor technology and software to monitor and reduce power usage and cooling in data centers, GigaOm reported.

headline.main: G.E. Invests in Green Data Center Start-Up
